text_block_list.text: Summer camp. Twin Turbo is still running around and sweating as energetically as ever… but.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Haah, haa…… Trainer! You are also smiling today! Alright!
She occasionally checks on me and repeats these words.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Trainer, you are smiling today too…!! Ehehe… haah, haah… haah, ehehe!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Haah, haa, *cough* *cough*… haaa…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Turbo's running… h-how was it…!! Am I sparkling… like Teio!?
Different from Tokai Teio, it's still just a small light. But―
The sand that was kicked and fluttered look sparkling under the sunlight, as if giving off sparks.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Really!?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: …kuuuuu. Trainer, Turbo will! Turbo will also do it too.
Do what? Before I could ask her that Twin Turbo started running again.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Is there anything that makes you happy and excited!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Eh, so suddenly like always… Ummm… It look like we will have curry tonight.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Not like that, something more fun! Something that make you go Uwaaaa! or Kyaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Ehh? Even if you suddenly ask me that… umm… ah. Oh right, earlier some local say there is firefly.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Firefly!? There is firefly!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: I heard. It's pretty deep in the mountain. I don't know the exact location.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Got it!! I'll go catch it!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Eh!? Wait, Turbo!? You can't catch firefly… hey! Please wait!
―Before dinner. There is something I want to talk about tomorrow training… But Twin Turbo is nowhere to be seen.
When I was at a loss searching for her―

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Umm! You are Twin Turbo's Trainer right? The truth is…!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Trainer…!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Uuuu～!! Trainerrrrrrr!! The firefly, I couldn't catch the firefly!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Haaah, haa… Where are you firefly…! If you think you can get away from Turbo… ah?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Woow…!! It's fireflies…! Amazing… amazing amazing!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Wait wait!! I'll show it to Trainer too!! Ugya!? Don't land on Turbo's nose! Eii, I'll catch you―

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ugya!? Uhhhhh!! Y-you're good…! But Turbo can still!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Uuu-… *sniffle*.
Poor thing, but all thing considered nothing bad happen. I tell Turbo that she shouldn't catch the fireflies.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Is that so!? Did Turbo do a bad thing!? Uhhhh… ugh, *hiks* I'm sorry……

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: *hiks* *hiks*…… Turbo want to make Trainer smile…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Smiling uhhhhh……
While wiping the large tear spilling from her odd-eye with a handkerchief, I repeat Twin Turbo's word in my head.
"I want to make you smile"
That's why she still trying to catch it, even if she was covered in mud… that Twin Turbo.
Overwhelmed with emotion, I muttered these words and Twin Turbo looked at me with a puzzled expression.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: *Sniffle*… you are happy even though you didn't see the firefly?
choice_data_list: Turbo's feeling make me very happy

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Eh… ah, y-yeah! You know, they look like stars! And then they flew around a lot, and then, and then…
Twin Turbo talk excitedly. Looking at her happily talking, I realized that…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: … Trainer, why are you smiling again?
I laugh again when I see Twin Turbo making puzzled face while looking at me.
choice_data_list: I'm happy when Turbo is happy.

text_block_list.text: If Twin Turbo is happy I'm also happy, if she is having fun I'm also having fun. I will also feel her Sorrow and suffering too.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: …Turbo is also the same!! If Trainer is happy, Turbo is happy too!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Trainer and Turbo are the same!!
Before I can say yes, 2 fireflies fly from the back of Turbo's clothes.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ah!? T-Trainer! It's fireflies! look look! I-I didn't catch it! It just stay on my clothes!!
It's only 2 faint lights, but they were brighter than the starry sky.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Thank you fireflies!!
Twin Turbo waving at the fireflies, and then she look at me who is still smiling.
choice_data_list: Let's see even more light next time

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: …! Yes, let's do it!! And then the two of us will be happy again.
I laughed as if I was drawn to the smile of Twin Turbo. The two fireflies flew far away into the mountains.
